headline: 'We haven't seen the worst of it': Retailers warn tariff impacts are far from over
summary: Tariffs are driving up costs and straining consumers, leaving retailers from Walmart to Best Buy navigating an unpredictable spending environment.

headline: The TJX Companies, Inc. (TJX) Has “Extraordinary” Bargains, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 11 Fresh Stocks On Jim Cramer’s Radar. The TJX Companies, Inc. (NYSE:TJX) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. The TJX Companies, Inc. (NYSE:TJX)’s shares, like those of its off-price retail peers, are in the green in 2025. They have gained 12.9% year-to-date, and have been driven by strong earnings […]

headline: Does the Strong 8% Monthly Gain Signal More Growth Ahead for TJX in 2025?
summary: If you have been eyeing TJX Companies and wondering whether now is the right time to act, you are not alone. With the share price recently closing at $136.61, a steady stream of investors are debating whether the ride can continue or if the story is already priced in. Over the last week, TJX saw a negligible change of 0.1%, but zooming out, the past month delivered an impressive 8.4% rise. For longer-term holders, the numbers are even more convincing: year-to-date gains of 12.8%, 18.0% over...
